Package infinity.ui

Class Ui

java.lang.Object
infinity.ui.Ui
public class Ui extends Object
This class handles the user interface of the bot.

    • botSays

      public static String botSays(String input, boolean isBreakLine)
      Prints the bot's response whilst being able to choose whether to print with a break line.
      Parameters:
      input - The String input to print.
      isBreakLine - Whether to print a break line after the input.
      Returns:
      The bot output with or without a breakline.
